title: About
content:
Hi! My name is Soufiane,



I'm a software and web developer based in Morocco, Agadir.

Iâ€™ve worked as a freelance web developer, worked on mutiple open projects, on web, mobile and desktop platforms.

I like learning, building and making new softwares and electronics, that I'm able to understand or find useful.

I like working in teams, and I take in consideration to have an intuitive UI and UX, clean and effecient code and architecture.

I sometimes write articles, I like having discussions with interesting people.
